column3: I-64W at the 63 MM in Woodford Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown about two miles west of the Midway exit due to a jackknifed semi.

column3: Fayette County Schools Resume Tuesday January 3:
column4: Use added caution if traveling around school areas.

column3: Fayette County Schools Resume Tuesday January 3:
column4: Stop as required by law for school buses loading or unloading.
Currently in effect and until January 3 at 1 p.m.
